32

The Treasure - hunt The Voice Among the Trees

PARTLY from the damping influence of this alarm , partly to rest [Silver]95-silver and [the sick folk]2583-the sick folk , [the whole party]2400-the whole party sat down as soon as [they]2400-the whole party had gained the brow of the ascent . [The plateau]2552-the plateau being somewhat tilted towards the west , [this spot on which [we]2587-we had paused]2586-this spot on which we had paused commanded a wide prospect on either hand . Before [us]2587-we , over the tree - tops , [we]2587-we beheld [the Cape of [the Woods fringed with surf]2589-the woods fringed with surf]2588-the cape of the woods fringed with surf ; behind , [we]2587-we not only looked down upon [the anchorage]3321-the anchorage and [Skeleton Island]32-skeleton island , but saw clear across [the spit]1717-the spit and [the eastern lowlands]2592-the eastern lowlands [a great field of [open sea upon the east]2594-open sea upon the east]2593-a great field of open sea upon the east . Sheer above [us]2587-we rose the Spyglass , here dotted with single pines , there black with precipices . There was no sound but that of the distant breakers , mounting from all round , and the chirp of countless insects in the brush . Not [a man]318-a man , not a sail , upon [the sea]250-the sea ; the very largeness of the view increased the sense of solitude . [Silver]95-silver , as [he]95-silver sat , took certain bearings with [his]95-silver compass . " There are three ' tall trees ' "[95-silver] said [he]95-silver , " about in the right line from [Skeleton Island]32-skeleton island . ' Spy - glass shoulder , ' [I]95-silver take it , means that lower p'int there . It 's [child]479-child 's play to find the stuff now . [I]95-silver 've half a mind to dine first . "[95-silver] " [I]104-morgan do n't feel sharp , "[104-morgan] growled [Morgan]104-morgan . " Thinkin ' o ' Flint [I]104-morgan think it were as done [me]104-morgan . "[104-morgan] " Ah , well , [[my]95-silver son]3200-my son , [you]3200-my son praise [your]3200-my son stars [he]95-silver 's dead , "[95-silver] said [Silver]95-silver . " [He]95-silver were [an ugly devil]4004-an ugly devil , "[2597-a third pirate] cried [a third pirate]2597-a third pirate with a shudder ; " that blue in the face too ! "[2597-a third pirate] " That was how the rum took [him]95-silver , "[156-merry] added [Merry]156-merry . " [Blue]167-blue ! Well , [I]156-merry reckon [he]95-silver was blue . That 's a true word . "[156-merry] Ever since [they]2598-they had found the skeleton and got upon this train of thought , [they]2598-they had spoken lower and lower , and [they]2598-they had almost got to whispering by now , so that the sound of [their]2598-they talk hardly interrupted the silence of the wood . All of a sudden , out of the middle of the trees in front of [us]2599-us , a thin , high , trembling voice struck up the well - known air and words : " Fifteen men on [the dead man]2836-the dead man 's chest Yo - ho - ho , and a bottle of rum ! "[0-i] [I]0-i never have seen [men]475-men more dreadfully affected than [the pirates]3339-the pirates . The colour went from [their]475-men six faces like enchantment ; [some]222-some leaped to [their]222-some feet , some clawed hold of [others]3841-others ; [Morgan]104-morgan grovelled on the ground . " It 's [Flint]74-flint , by ! "[156-merry] cried [Merry]156-merry . The song had stopped as suddenly as it began broken off , [you]2604-you would have said , in the middle of a note , as though [someone]2971-someone had laid [his]2971-someone hand upon [the singer]2067-the singer 's mouth . Coming through the clear , sunny atmosphere among the green tree - tops , [I]0-i thought it had sounded airily and sweetly ; and the effect on [[my]0-i companions]1983-my companions was [the stranger]331-the stranger . " Come , "[95-silver] said [Silver]95-silver , struggling with [his]95-silver ashen lips to get the word out ; " this wo n't do . Stand by to go about . This is a rum start , and [I]95-silver ca n't name the voice , but it 's someone skylarking [someone that 's flesh and blood]4006-someone that 's flesh and blood , and [you]2604-you may lay to that . "[95-silver] [His]95-silver courage had come back as [he]95-silver spoke , and some of the colour to [his]95-silver face along with it . Already [the others]3442-the others had begun to lend an ear to this encouragement and were coming a little to [themselves]3442-the others , when the same voice broke out again not this time singing , but in a faint distant hail that echoed yet fainter among the clefts of the Spy - glass . " [Darby M'Graw]168-darby m'graw , "[595-the buccaneers] it wailed for that is the word that best describes the sound " [Darby M'Graw]168-darby m'graw ! [Darby M'Graw]168-darby m'graw ! "[595-the buccaneers] again and again and again ; and then rising a little higher , and with an oath that [I]0-i leave out : " Fetch aft the rum , [Darby]168-darby m'graw ! "[0-i] [The buccaneers]595-the buccaneers remained rooted to the ground , [their]595-the buccaneers eyes starting from [their]595-the buccaneers heads . Long after the voice had died away [they]595-the buccaneers still stared in silence , dreadfully , before [them]595-the buccaneers . " That fixes it ! "[596-one] gasped [one]596-one . " Let 's go . "[596-one] " [They]4007-they was [his]121-dick last words , "[104-morgan] moaned [Morgan]104-morgan , " [his]121-dick last words above board . "[104-morgan] [Dick]121-dick had [his]121-dick Bible out and was praying volubly . [He]121-dick had been well brought up , had [Dick]121-dick , before [he]121-dick came to [sea]246-sea and fell among [bad companions]2613-bad companions . Still [Silver]95-silver was unconquered . [I]0-i could hear [his]121-dick teeth rattle in [his]121-dick head , but [he]121-dick had not yet surrendered . " Nobody in [this here]4008-this here island ever heard of [Darby]168-darby m'graw , "[121-dick] [he]121-dick muttered ; " not one but [us]4009-us that 's here . "[121-dick] And then , making a great effort : " [Shipmates]3903-shipmates , "[121-dick] [he]121-dick cried , " [I]121-dick 'm here to get that stuff , and [I]121-dick 'll not be beat by [man]2910-man or devil . [I]121-dick never was feared of [Flint]74-flint in [his]74-flint life , and , by the powers , [I]121-dick 'll face [him]74-flint dead . There 's seven hundred thousand pound not a quarter of a mile from here . When did ever [a gentleman o ' fortune]4012-a gentleman o ' fortune show [his]74-flint stern to that much dollars for [a boozy old seaman with a blue mug]4013-a boozy old seaman with a blue mug and [him]74-flint dead too ? "[121-dick] But there was no sign of reawakening courage in [[his]121-dick followers]2520-his followers , rather , indeed , of growing terror at the irreverence of [his]121-dick words . " Belay there , [John]95-silver ! "[156-merry] said [Merry]156-merry . " Do n't [you]95-silver cross [a sperrit]4014-a sperrit . "[156-merry] And [the rest]599-the rest were all too terrified to reply . [They]599-the rest would have run away severally had [they]599-the rest dared ; but fear kept [them]599-the rest together , and kept [them]599-the rest close by [John]95-silver , as if [his]95-silver daring helped [them]599-the rest . [He]95-silver , on [his]95-silver part , had pretty well fought [his]95-silver weakness down . " [Sperrit]165-sperrit ? Well , maybe , "[95-silver] [he]95-silver said . " But there 's one thing not clear to [me]95-silver . There was an echo . Now , [no man]1267-no man ever seen [a sperrit with a shadow]4016-a sperrit with a shadow ; well then , what 's [he]1267-no man doing with an echo to [him]1267-no man , [I]95-silver should like to know ? That ai n't in natur ' , surely ? "[95-silver] This argument seemed weak enough to [me]0-i . But [you]2616-you can never tell what will affect the superstitious , and to [my]0-i wonder , [George Merry]156-merry was greatly relieved . " Well , that 's so , "[95-silver] [he]95-silver said . " [You]95-silver 've a head upon [your]95-silver shoulders , [John]95-silver , and no mistake . ' Bout [ship]3051-ship , [mates]2978-mates ! [This here crew]4019-this here crew is on a wrong tack , [I]95-silver do believe . And come to think on it , it was like [Flint]74-flint 's voice , [I]95-silver grant [you]2616-you , but not just so clear - away like it , after all . It was liker [somebody else]4020-somebody else 's voice now it was liker "[95-silver] " By the powers , [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn ! "[95-silver] roared [Silver]95-silver . " Aye , and so it were , "[104-morgan] cried [Morgan]104-morgan , springing on [his]104-morgan knees . " [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn it were ! "[104-morgan] " [It]4021-it do n't make much odds , do it , now ? "[121-dick] asked [Dick]121-dick . " [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn 's not here in the body any more'n [Flint]74-flint . "[121-dick] But [the older hands]2617-the older hands greeted this remark with scorn . " Why , [nobody]236-nobody minds [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , "[156-merry] cried [Merry]156-merry ; " dead or alive , [nobody]236-nobody minds [him]103-ben gunn . "[156-merry] It was extraordinary how [their]2617-the older hands spirits had returned and how the natural colour had revived in [their]2617-the older hands faces . Soon [they]2617-the older hands were chatting together , with intervals of listening ; and not long after , hearing no further sound , [they]2617-the older hands shouldered the tools and set forth again , [Merry]156-merry walking first with [Silver]95-silver 's compass to keep [them]2617-the older hands on the right line with [Skeleton Island]32-skeleton island . [He]95-silver had said the truth : dead or alive , [nobody]236-nobody minded [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn . [Dick]121-dick alone still held [his]121-dick Bible , and looked around [him]121-dick as [he]121-dick went , with fearful glances ; but [he]121-dick found no sympathy , and [Silver]95-silver even joked [him]121-dick on [his]95-silver precautions . " [I]95-silver told [you]121-dick , "[95-silver] said [he]95-silver " [I]95-silver told [you]121-dick [you]121-dick had sp'iled [your]121-dick Bible . If it ai n't no good to swear by , what do [you]121-dick suppose [a sperrit]4014-a sperrit would give for it ? Not that ! "[95-silver] and [he]95-silver snapped [his]95-silver big fingers , halting a moment on [his]95-silver crutch . But [Dick]121-dick was not to be comforted ; indeed , it was soon plain to [me]0-i that [the lad]1134-the lad was falling sick ; hastened by heat , exhaustion , and the shock of [his]1134-the lad alarm , the fever , predicted by [Dr. Livesey]63-dr. livesey , was evidently growing swiftly higher . It was fine open walking here , upon [the summit]2620-the summit ; [our]2621-we way lay a little downhill , for , as [I]0-i have said , [the plateau]2552-the plateau tilted towards the west . The pines , great and small , grew wide apart ; and even between the clumps of nutmeg and azalea , wide open spaces baked in the hot sunshine . Striking , as [we]2621-we did , pretty near [north - west across [the island]187-the island]2623-north - west across the island , [we]2621-we drew , on the one hand , ever nearer under the shoulders of the Spy - glass , and on the other , looked ever wider over [that western bay where [I]0-i had once tossed and trembled in the coracle]2625-that western bay where i had once tossed and trembled in the coracle . The first of the tall trees was reached , and by the bearings proved the wrong one . So with the second . The third rose nearly two hundred feet into the air above a clump of underwood a giant of a vegetable , with a red column as big as [a cottage]2626-a cottage , and a wide shadow around in which [a company]2627-a company could have manoeuvred . It was conspicuous far to [sea both on the east and west]2628-sea both on the east and west and might have been entered as a sailing mark upon the chart . But it was not its size that now impressed [[my]0-i companions]1983-my companions ; it was the knowledge that seven hundred thousand pounds in gold lay somewhere buried below its spreading shadow . The thought of the money , as [they]1983-my companions drew nearer , swallowed up [their]1983-my companions previous terrors . [Their]1983-my companions eyes burned in [their]1983-my companions heads ; [their]1983-my companions feet grew speedier and lighter ; [their]1983-my companions whole soul was found up in that fortune , that whole lifetime of extravagance and pleasure , that lay waiting there for each of [them]1983-my companions . [Silver]95-silver hobbled , grunting , on [his]95-silver crutch ; [his]95-silver nostrils stood out and quivered ; [he]95-silver cursed like [a madman]2630-a madman when the flies settled on [his]95-silver hot and shiny countenance ; [he]95-silver plucked furiously at the line that held [me]0-i to [him]95-silver and from time to time turned [his]95-silver eyes upon [me]0-i with a deadly look . Certainly [he]95-silver took no pains to hide [his]95-silver thoughts , and certainly [I]0-i read them like print . In the immediate nearness of the gold , all else had been forgotten : [his]95-silver promise and [the doctor]289-the doctor 's warning were both things of the past , and [I]0-i could not doubt that [he]95-silver hoped to seize upon the treasure , find and board [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola under cover of night , cut every honest throat about [that island]746-that island , and sail away as [he]95-silver had at first intended , laden with crimes and riches . Shaken as [I]0-i was with these alarms , it was hard for [me]0-i to keep up with the rapid pace of [the treasure - hunters]2633-the treasure - hunters . Now and again [I]0-i stumbled , and it was then that [Silver]95-silver plucked so roughly at the rope and launched at [me]0-i [his]95-silver murderous glances . [Dick]121-dick , who had dropped behind [us]2634-us and now brought up the rear , was babbling to [himself]121-dick both prayers and curses as [his]121-dick fever kept rising . This also added to [my]0-i wretchedness , and to crown all , [I]0-i was haunted by the thought of the tragedy that had once been acted on [that plateau]2635-that plateau , when [that ungodly buccaneer with the blue face [he]2636-that ungodly buccaneer with the blue face he who died at savannah who died at [Savannah]5-savannah]2636-that ungodly buccaneer with the blue face he who died at savannah , singing and shouting for drink had there , with [his]2636-that ungodly buccaneer with the blue face he who died at savannah own hand , cut down [[his]2636-that ungodly buccaneer with the blue face he who died at savannah six accomplices]2637-his six accomplices . This grove that was now so peaceful must then have rung with cries , [I]0-i thought ; and even with the thought [I]0-i could believe [I]0-i heard it ringing still . [We]2634-us were now at the margin of the thicket . " [Huzza]169-huzza , [mates]2978-mates , all together ! "[156-merry] shouted [Merry]156-merry ; and [the foremost]2638-the foremost broke into a run . And suddenly , not ten yards further , [we]2634-us beheld [them]2637-his six accomplices stop . A low cry arose . [Silver]95-silver doubled [his]95-silver pace , digging away with the foot of [his]95-silver crutch like [one possessed]2639-one possessed ; and next moment [he]95-silver and [I]0-i had come also to a dead halt . Before [us]2634-us was a great excavation , not very recent , for the sides had fallen in and grass had sprouted on the bottom . In this were the shaft of a pick broken in two and the boards of several packing - cases strewn around . On one of these boards [I]0-i saw , branded with a hot iron , the name [WALRUS]117-the old walrus the name of [[Flint]74-flint 's ship]3427-flint 's ship . All was clear to probation . [The CACHE]54-the cache had been found and rifled ; the seven hundred thousand pounds were gone !

33

The Fall of a Chieftain

THERE never was such an overturn in [this world]1945-this world . [Each of [these six men]2643-these six men]2642-each of these six men was as though [he]2642-each of these six men had been struck . But with [Silver]95-silver the blow passed almost instantly . Every thought of [his]95-silver soul had been set full - stretch , like a racer , on that money ; well , [he]95-silver was brought up , in a single second , dead ; and [he]95-silver kept [his]95-silver head , found [his]95-silver temper , and changed [his]95-silver plan before [the others]3442-the others had had time to realize the disappointment . " [Jim]70-jim , "[95-silver] [he]95-silver whispered , " take that , and stand by for trouble . "[95-silver] And [he]95-silver passed [me]0-i a double - barrelled pistol . At the same time , [he]95-silver began quietly moving northward , and in a few steps had put the hollow between [us]2645-us two and [the other five]2646-the other five . Then [he]95-silver looked at [me]0-i and nodded , as much as to say , " [Here]2842-here is a narrow corner , "[95-silver] as , indeed , [I]0-i thought it was . [His]95-silver looks were not quite friendly , and [I]0-i was so revolted at these constant changes that [I]0-i could not forbear whispering , " So [you]95-silver 've changed sides again . "[0-i] There was no time left for [him]95-silver to answer in . [The buccaneers , with oaths and cries]2647-the buccaneers , with oaths and cries , began to leap , one after another , into the pit and to dig with [their]2647-the buccaneers , with oaths and cries fingers , throwing the boards aside as [they]2647-the buccaneers , with oaths and cries did so . [Morgan]104-morgan found a piece of gold . [He]104-morgan held it up with a perfect spout of oaths . It was a two - guinea piece , and it went from hand to hand among [them]2647-the buccaneers , with oaths and cries for a quarter of a minute . " Two guineas ! "[156-merry] roared [Merry]156-merry , shaking it at [Silver]95-silver . " That 's [your]95-silver seven hundred thousand pounds , is it ? [You]95-silver 're [the man]2888-the man for bargains , ai n't [you]95-silver ? [You]95-silver 're [him]95-silver that never bungled nothing , [[you]95-silver wooden - headed lubber]4028-you wooden - headed lubber ! "[156-merry] " Dig away , [boys]2870-boys , "[95-silver] said [Silver]95-silver with the coolest insolence ; " [you]156-merry 'll find some pig - nuts and [I]95-silver should n't wonder . "[95-silver] " Pig - nuts ! "[156-merry] repeated [Merry]156-merry , in a scream . " [Mates]2978-mates , do [you]2978-mates hear that ? [I]156-merry tell [you]2978-mates now , [that man there]4031-that man there knew it all along . Look in the face of [him]4031-that man there and [you]2978-mates 'll see it wrote there . "[156-merry] " Ah , [Merry]156-merry , "[95-silver] remarked [Silver]95-silver , ' standing for [cap'n]3202-cap'n again ? [You]156-merry 're [a pushing lad]2649-a pushing lad , to be sure . " But this time [everyone]1109-everyone was entirely in [Merry]156-merry 's favour . [They]1109-everyone began to scramble out of the excavation , darting furious glances behind [them]1109-everyone . One thing [I]2978-mates observed , which looked well for [us]4033-us : [they]1109-everyone all got out upon the opposite side from [Silver]95-silver . Well , there [we]4033-us stood , two on one side , five on the other , the pit between [us]4033-us , and [nobody]236-nobody screwed up high enough to offer the first blow . [Silver]95-silver never moved ; [he]95-silver watched [them]1109-everyone , very upright on [his]95-silver crutch , and looked as cool as ever [I]2978-mates saw [him]95-silver . [He]95-silver was brave , and no mistake . At last [Merry]156-merry seemed to think a speech might help matters . "[2978-mates] [Mates]2978-mates , " says [he]0-i , "[2978-mates] there 's [two of [them]2651-two of them alone there alone [there]2846-there]2651-two of them alone there ; [one]596-one 's [the old cripple that brought [us]2655-us all here and blundered [us]2655-us down to this]2654-the old cripple that brought us all here and blundered us down to this ; the other 's that cub that [I]0-i mean to have the heart of . Now , [mates]2978-mates " [He]0-i was raising [his]0-i arm and [his]0-i voice , and plainly meant to lead a charge . But just then crack ! crack ! crack ! three musket - shots flashed out of the thicket . [Merry]156-merry tumbled head foremost into [the excavation]4035-the excavation ; [the man with the bandage]4036-the man with the bandage spun round like a teetotum and fell all [his]4036-the man with the bandage length upon [his]4036-the man with the bandage side , where [he]4036-the man with the bandage lay dead , but still twitching ; and [the other three]1627-the other three turned and ran for it with all [their]1627-the other three might . Before [you]156-merry could wink , [Long John]95-silver had fired two barrels of a pistol into the struggling [Merry]156-merry , and as [the man]2888-the man rolled up [his]2888-the man eyes at [him]2888-the man in the last agony , "[156-merry] [George]156-merry , " said [he]0-i , "[156-merry] [I]0-i reckon [I]0-i settled [you]156-merry . " At the same moment , [the doctor]289-the doctor , [Gray]133-gray , and [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn joined [us]2658-us , with smoking muskets , from among the nutmeg - trees . "[0-i] Forward ! " cried [the doctor]289-the doctor . "[0-i] Double quick , [[my]0-i lads]3356-my lads . [We]2658-us must head 'em off [the boats]1220-the boats . " And [we]2658-us set off at a great pace , sometimes plunging through the bushes to the chest . [I]2886-doctor tell [you]4041-you , but [Silver]95-silver was anxious to keep up with [us]2658-us . The work [that man]1009-that man went through , leaping on [his]1009-that man crutch till the muscles of [his]1009-that man chest were fit to burst , was work [no sound man]4043-no sound man ever equalled ; and so thinks [the doctor]289-the doctor . As it was , [he]95-silver was already thirty yards behind [us]2663-we and on the verge of strangling when [we]2663-we reached [the brow of [the slope]618-the slope]4045-the brow of the slope . "[2886-doctor] [Doctor]2886-doctor , " [he]95-silver hailed , ' see there ! No hurry ! "[2886-doctor] Sure enough there was no hurry . In [a more open part of [the plateau]2552-the plateau]2661-a more open part of the plateau , [we]2663-we could see [the three survivors]2664-the three survivors still running in the same direction as [they]2664-the three survivors had started , right for [Mizzenmast Hill]55-mizzenmast hill . [We]2663-we were already between [them]2664-the three survivors and [the boats]1220-the boats ; and so [we]2663-we four sat down to breathe , while [Long John]95-silver , mopping [his]95-silver face , came slowly up with [us]2663-we . " Thank [ye]2886-doctor kindly , [doctor]2886-doctor , "[95-silver] says [he]95-silver . " [You]2886-doctor came in in about the nick , [I]95-silver guess , for [me]95-silver and [Hawkins]70-jim . And so it 's [you]2886-doctor , [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn ! "[95-silver] [he]95-silver added . " Well , [you]2886-doctor 're [a nice one]4048-a nice one , to be sure . "[95-silver] " [I]2666-the maroon 'm [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , [I]2666-the maroon am , "[2666-the maroon] replied [the maroon]2666-the maroon , wriggling like an eel in [his]2666-the maroon embarrassment . " And , "[95-silver] [he]95-silver added , after a long pause , " how do , [Mr. Silver]101-silver ? Pretty well , [I]95-silver thank [ye]2886-doctor , says [you]2886-doctor . "[95-silver] " [Ben]103-ben gunn , [Ben]103-ben gunn , "[101-silver] murmured [Silver]101-silver , " to think as [you]103-ben gunn 've done [me]101-silver ! "[101-silver] [The doctor]289-the doctor sent back [Gray]133-gray for one of the pick - axes deserted , in [their]2668-their flight , by [the mutineers]1384-the mutineers , and then as [we]2670-we proceeded leisurely downhill to where [the boats]1220-the boats were lying , related in a few words what had taken place . It was a story that profoundly interested [Silver]101-silver ; and [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , [the half - idiot maroon]2672-the half - idiot maroon , was [the hero from beginning to end]2673-the hero from beginning to end . [Ben]103-ben gunn , in [his]103-ben gunn long , lonely wanderings about [the island]187-the island , had found the skeleton it was [he]103-ben gunn that had rifled [it]2675-it ; [he]103-ben gunn had found the treasure ; [he]103-ben gunn had dug it up it was the haft of [his]103-ben gunn pick - axe that lay broken in the excavation ; [he]103-ben gunn had carried it on [his]103-ben gunn back , in many weary journeys , from the foot of the tall pine to a cave [he]103-ben gunn had on [the two - pointed hill at the north - east angle of [the island]187-the island]2676-the two - pointed hill at the north - east angle of the island , and there it had lain stored in safety since two months before the arrival of [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola . When [the doctor]289-the doctor had wormed this secret from [him]103-ben gunn on the afternoon of the attack , and when next morning [he]103-ben gunn saw [the anchorage]3321-the anchorage deserted , [he]103-ben gunn had gone to [Silver]101-silver , given [him]103-ben gunn the chart , which was now useless given [him]103-ben gunn [the stores]3509-the stores , for [[Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn 's cave]2681-ben gunn 's cave was well supplied with goats ' meat salted by [himself]103-ben gunn given anything and everything to get a chance of moving in safety from the stockade to [the two - pointed hill]2682-the two - pointed hill , there to be clear of malaria and keep a guard upon the money . " As for [you]0-i , [Jim]70-jim , "[103-ben gunn] [he]103-ben gunn said , " it went against [my]103-ben gunn heart , but [I]103-ben gunn did what [I]103-ben gunn thought best for [those who had stood by [their]4049-those who had stood by their duty duty]4049-those who had stood by their duty ; and if [you]0-i were not one of these , whose fault was it ? "[103-ben gunn] That morning , finding that [I]0-i was to be involved in the horrid disappointment [he]103-ben gunn had prepared for [the mutineers]1384-the mutineers , [he]103-ben gunn had run all the way to [the cave]2684-the cave , and leaving [the squire]661-the squire to guard [the captain]234-the captain , had taken [Gray]133-gray and [the maroon]2666-the maroon and started , making the diagonal across [the island]187-the island to be at hand beside [the pine]2689-the pine . Soon , however , [he]103-ben gunn saw that [[our]2690-our party]1299-our party had the start of [him]103-ben gunn ; and [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , being [fleet of foot]2692-fleet of foot , had been dispatched in front to do [his]103-ben gunn best alone . Then it had occurred to [him]103-ben gunn to work upon the superstitions of [[his]103-ben gunn former shipmates]2693-his former shipmates , and [he]103-ben gunn was so far successful that [Gray]133-gray and [the doctor]289-the doctor had come up and were already ambushed before the arrival of [the treasure - hunters]2633-the treasure - hunters . " Ah , "[101-silver] said [Silver]101-silver , " it were fortunate for [me]101-silver that [I]101-silver had [Hawkins]70-jim [here]2842-here . [You]63-dr. livesey would have let [old John]95-silver be cut to bits , and never given it a thought , [doctor]2886-doctor . "[101-silver] " Not a thought , "[63-dr. livesey] replied [Dr. Livesey]63-dr. livesey cheerily . And by this time [we]2696-we had reached [the gigs]1480-the gigs . [The doctor]289-the doctor , with the pick - axe , demolished one of [them]1480-the gigs , and then [we]2696-we all got aboard the other and set out to go round by [sea]246-sea for [North Inlet]47-north inlet . This was a run of eight or nine miles . [Silver]95-silver , though [he]95-silver was almost killed already with fatigue , was set to an oar , like the rest of [us]2696-we , and [we]2696-we were soon skimming swiftly over [a smooth sea]2700-a smooth sea . Soon [we]2696-we passed out of [the straits]2098-the straits and doubled [the south - east corner of [the island]187-the island]2702-the south - east corner of the island , round which , four days ago , [we]2696-we had towed [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola . As [we]2696-we passed [the two - pointed hill]2682-the two - pointed hill , [we]2696-we could see the black mouth of [[Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn 's cave]2681-ben gunn 's cave and a figure standing by it , leaning on a musket . [It]2706-it was [the squire]661-the squire , and [we]2696-we waved a handkerchief and gave [him]661-the squire three cheers , in which the voice of [Silver]95-silver joined as heartily as any . Three miles farther , just inside [the mouth of [North Inlet]47-north inlet]2708-the mouth of north inlet , what should [we]2696-we meet but [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola , cruising by [herself]16-the hispaniola ? The last flood had lifted [her]16-the hispaniola , and had there been much wind or a strong tide current , as in [the southern anchorage]3755-the southern anchorage , [we]2696-we should never have found [her]16-the hispaniola more , or found [her]16-the hispaniola stranded beyond help . As it was , there was little amiss beyond the wreck of [the main - sail]2710-the main - sail . Another anchor was got ready and dropped in a fathom and a half of water . [We]2696-we all pulled round again to [Rum Cove]56-rum cove , the nearest point for [[Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn 's treasure - house]2711-ben gunn 's treasure - house ; and then [Gray]133-gray , single - handed , returned with the gig to [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola , where [he]133-gray was to pass the night on guard . [A gentle slope]2712-a gentle slope ran up from [the beach]313-the beach to [the entrance of [the cave]2684-the cave]2714-the entrance of the cave . At the top , [the squire]661-the squire met [us]2696-we . To [me]0-i [he]661-the squire was cordial and kind , saying nothing of [my]0-i escapade either in the way of blame or praise . At [Silver]95-silver 's polite salute [he]661-the squire somewhat flushed . " [John Silver]95-silver , "[661-the squire] [he]661-the squire said , " [you]95-silver 're [a prodigious villain]4052-a prodigious villain and [imposter a monstrous imposter]4053-imposter a monstrous imposter , [sir]2853-sir . [I]661-the squire am told [I]661-the squire am not to prosecute [you]95-silver . Well , then , [I]661-the squire will not . But [the dead men]4055-the dead men , [sir]2853-sir , hang about [your]95-silver neck like mill - stones . "[661-the squire] " Thank [you]2853-sir kindly , [sir]2853-sir , "[95-silver] replied [Long John]95-silver , again saluting . " [I]661-the squire dare [you]95-silver to thank [me]661-the squire ! "[661-the squire] cried [the squire]661-the squire . " It is a gross dereliction of [my]661-the squire duty . Stand back . "[661-the squire] And thereupon [we]2718-we all entered [the cave]2684-the cave . [It]2684-the cave was [a large , airy place]2720-a large , airy place , with a little spring and [a pool of clear water , overhung with ferns]2721-a pool of clear water , overhung with ferns . The floor was sand . Before a big fire lay [Captain Smollett]108-captain smollett ; and in a far corner , only duskily flickered over by the blaze , [I]0-i beheld great heaps of coin and quadrilaterals built of bars of gold . That was [Flint]74-flint 's treasure that [we]2718-we had come so far to seek and that had cost already the lives of [seventeen men from [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola]2722-seventeen men from the hispaniola . How many it had cost in the amassing , what blood and sorrow , what [good ships]2723-good ships scuttled on [the deep]2724-the deep , what [brave men walking the plank blindfold]2725-brave men walking the plank blindfold , what shot of cannon , what shame and lies and cruelty , perhaps [no man alive]2726-no man alive could tell . Yet there were still three upon [that island]746-that island [Silver]95-silver , and [old Morgan]104-morgan , and [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn who had each taken [his]103-ben gunn share in these crimes , as [each]495-each had hoped in vain to share in the reward . " Come in , [Jim]70-jim , "[234-the captain] said [the captain]234-the captain . " [You]70-jim 're [a good boy]336-a good boy in [your]70-jim line , [Jim]70-jim , but [I]234-the captain do n't think [you]70-jim and [me'll]4059-me'll go to [sea]246-sea again . [You]70-jim 're too much of the born favourite for [me]234-the captain . Is that [you]70-jim , [John Silver]95-silver ? What brings [you]70-jim [here]2842-here , [man]2910-man ? "[234-the captain] " Come back to [[my]95-silver dooty]4063-my dooty , [sir]2853-sir , "[95-silver] returned [Silver]95-silver . " Ah ! "[234-the captain] said [the captain]234-the captain , and that was all [he]234-the captain said . What a supper [I]0-i had of it that night , with all [[my]0-i friends]3560-my friends around [me]0-i ; and what a meal it was , with [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn 's salted goat and some delicacies and a bottle of old wine from [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola . Never , [I]0-i am sure , were [people]245-people gayer or happier . And there was [Silver]95-silver , sitting back almost out of the firelight , but eating heartily , prompt to spring forward when anything was wanted , even joining quietly in [our]2733-we laughter [the same bland , polite , obsequious seaman of the voyage out]2734-the same bland , polite , obsequious seaman of the voyage out .

34

And Last

THE next morning [we]2733-we fell early to work , for the transportation of this great mass of gold near a mile by [land]2106-land to [the beach]313-the beach , and thence three miles by [boat]2737-boat to [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola , was a considerable task for so small [a number of [workmen]2739-workmen]2738-a number of workmen . [The three fellows still abroad upon [the island]187-the island]2740-the three fellows still abroad upon the island did not greatly trouble [us]2733-we ; a single sentry on [the shoulder of [the hill]365-the hill]2742-the shoulder of the hill was sufficient to ensure [us]2733-we against any sudden onslaught , and [we]2733-we thought , besides , [they]2740-the three fellows still abroad upon the island had had more than enough of fighting . Therefore the work was pushed on briskly . [Gray]133-gray and [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn came and went with [the boat]1260-the boat , while [the rest]599-the rest during [their]599-the rest absences piled treasure on [the beach]313-the beach . Two of the bars , slung in a rope 's end , made a good load for [a grown man]2747-a grown man one that [he]2747-a grown man was glad to walk slowly with . For [my]0-i part , as [I]0-i was not much use at carrying , [I]0-i was kept busy all day in [the cave]2684-the cave packing the minted money into bread - bags . It was a strange collection , like [Billy Bones]69-bill 's hoard for the diversity of coinage , but so much larger and so much more varied that [I]0-i think [I]0-i never had more pleasure than in sorting them . English , French , Spanish , Portuguese , [Georges]170-georges , and [Louises]171-louises , doubloons and double guineas and moidores and sequins , the pictures of [all the kings of [Europe]58-europe]2749-all the kings of europe for the last hundred years , strange Oriental pieces stamped with what looked like wisps of string or bits of spider 's web , round pieces and square pieces , and pieces bored through the middle , as if to wear them round [your]2750-your neck nearly every variety of money in [the world]2855-the world must , [I]0-i think , have found a place in that collection ; and for number , [I]0-i am sure they were like autumn leaves , so that [my]0-i back ached with stooping and [my]0-i fingers with sorting them out . Day after day this work went on ; by every evening a fortune had been stowed aboard , but there was another fortune waiting for the morrow ; and all this time [we]2752-us heard nothing of [the three surviving mutineers]2753-the three surviving mutineers . At last [I]0-i think it was on the third night [the doctor]289-the doctor and [I]0-i were strolling on the shoulder of the hill where [it]2755-it overlooks [the lowlands of [the isle]751-the isle]2756-the lowlands of the isle , when , from out the thick darkness below , the wind brought [us]2752-us a noise between shrieking and singing . It was only a snatch that reached [our]2752-us ears , followed by the former silence . " Heaven forgive [them]2753-the three surviving mutineers , "[289-the doctor] said [the doctor]289-the doctor ; " ' tis [the mutineers]1384-the mutineers ! "[289-the doctor] " All drunk , [sir]2853-sir , "[95-silver] struck in the voice of [Silver]95-silver from behind [us]2752-us . [Silver]95-silver , [I]0-i should say , was allowed [his]95-silver entire liberty , and in spite of daily rebuffs , seemed to regard [himself]95-silver once more as quite [a privileged and friendly dependent]2759-a privileged and friendly dependent . Indeed , it was remarkable how well [he]95-silver bore these slights and with what unwearying politeness [he]95-silver kept on trying to ingratiate [himself]95-silver with all . Yet , [I]0-i think , [none]529-none treated [him]95-silver better than a dog , unless it was [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , who was still terribly afraid of [[his]103-ben gunn old quartermaster]2761-his old quartermaster , or [myself]0-i , who had really something to thank [him]95-silver for ; although for that matter , [I]0-i suppose , [I]0-i had reason to think even worse of [him]95-silver than [anybody else]2762-anybody else , for [I]0-i had seen [him]95-silver meditating a fresh treachery upon [the plateau]2552-the plateau . Accordingly , it was pretty gruffly that [the doctor]289-the doctor answered [him]95-silver . " Drunk or raving , "[95-silver] said [he]95-silver . " Right [you]289-the doctor were , [sir]2853-sir , "[95-silver] replied [Silver]95-silver ; " and precious little odds which , to [you]289-the doctor and [me]95-silver . "[95-silver] " [I]289-the doctor suppose [you]289-the doctor would hardly ask [me]289-the doctor to call [you]289-the doctor [a humane man]4068-a humane man , "[289-the doctor] returned [the doctor]289-the doctor with a sneer , " and so [my]289-the doctor feelings may surprise [you]289-the doctor , [Master Silver]101-silver . But if [I]289-the doctor were sure [they]4069-them were raving as [I]289-the doctor am morally certain one , at least , of [them]4069-them is down with fever [I]289-the doctor should leave [this camp]4070-this camp , and at whatever risk to [my]289-the doctor own carcass , take [them]4069-them the assistance of [my]289-the doctor skill . "[289-the doctor] " Ask [your]289-the doctor pardon , [sir]2853-sir , [you]289-the doctor would be very wrong , "[95-silver] quoth [Silver]101-silver . " [You]289-the doctor would lose [your]289-the doctor precious life , and [you]289-the doctor may lay to that . [I]101-silver 'm on [your]289-the doctor side now , hand and glove ; and [I]101-silver should n't wish for to see [the party]653-the party weakened , let alone [yourself]289-the doctor , seeing as [I]101-silver know what [I]101-silver owes [you]289-the doctor . But [these men]3483-these men down there , [they]3483-these men could n't keep [their]3483-these men word no , not supposing [they]3483-these men wished to ; and what 's more , [they]3483-these men could n't believe as [you]289-the doctor could . "[101-silver] " No , "[289-the doctor] said [the doctor]289-the doctor . " [You]289-the doctor 're [the man]2888-the man to keep [your]289-the doctor word , [we]2767-we know that . "[289-the doctor] Well , that was about the last news [we]2767-we had of [the three pirates]2768-the three pirates . Only once [we]2767-we heard a gunshot a great way off and supposed [them]2768-the three pirates to be hunting . A council was held , and it was decided that [we]2767-we must desert [them]2768-the three pirates on [the island]187-the island to the huge glee , [I]0-i must say , of [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , and with the strong approval of [Gray]133-gray . [We]2767-we left a good stock of powder and shot , the bulk of the salt goat , a few medicines , and some other necessaries , tools , clothing , a spare sail , a fathom or two of rope , and by the particular desire of [the doctor]289-the doctor , a handsome present of tobacco . That was about [our]2767-we last doing on [the island]187-the island . Before that , [we]2767-we had got the treasure stowed and had shipped enough water and the remainder of the goat meat in case of any distress ; and at last , one fine morning , [we]2767-we weighed anchor , which was about all that [we]2767-we could manage , and stood out of [North Inlet]47-north inlet , the same colours flying that [the captain]234-the captain had flown and fought under at [the palisade]1651-the palisade . [The three fellows]2774-the three fellows must have been watching [us]2767-we closer than [we]2767-we thought for , as [we]2767-we soon had proved . For coming through [the narrows]2092-the narrows , [we]2767-we had to lie very near [the southern point]2776-the southern point , and there [we]2767-we saw [all three of [them]2774-the three fellows]2777-all three of them kneeling together on a spit of sand , with [their]2777-all three of them arms raised in supplication . It went to all [our]2767-we hearts , [I]0-i think , to leave [them]2774-the three fellows in that wretched state ; but [we]2767-we could not risk another mutiny ; and to take [them]2774-the three fellows [home]659-home for the gibbet would have been a cruel sort of kindness . [The doctor]289-the doctor hailed [them]2774-the three fellows and told [them]2774-the three fellows of the stores [we]2767-we had left , and where [they]2774-the three fellows were to find [them]2774-the three fellows . But [they]2774-the three fellows continued to call [us]2767-we by name and appeal to [us]2767-we , for God 's sake , to be merciful and not leave [them]2774-the three fellows to die in such a place . At last , seeing [the ship]755-the ship still bore on [her]755-the ship course and was now swiftly drawing out of earshot , one of [them]2774-the three fellows [I]0-i know not which it was leapt to [his]2781-his feet with a hoarse cry , whipped [his]2781-his musket to [his]2781-his shoulder , and sent a shot whistling over [Silver]101-silver 's head and through the main - sail . After that , [we]2767-we kept under cover of the bulwarks , and when next [I]0-i looked out [they]2774-the three fellows had disappeared from [the spit]1717-the spit , and [the spit]1717-the spit [itself]1717-the spit had almost melted out of sight in the growing distance . That was , at least , the end of that ; and before noon , to [my]0-i inexpressible joy , [the highest rock of [Treasure Island]1-treasure island]2784-the highest rock of treasure island had sunk into [the blue round of sea]2785-the blue round of sea . [We]2767-we were so short of [men]475-men that [everyone on board]2787-everyone on board had to bear a hand only [the captain lying on a mattress in the stern and giving [his]2788-the captain lying on a mattress in the stern and giving his orders , for though greatly recovered he was still in want of quiet orders , for though greatly recovered [he]2788-the captain lying on a mattress in the stern and giving his orders , for though greatly recovered he was still in want of quiet was still in want of quiet]2788-the captain lying on a mattress in the stern and giving his orders , for though greatly recovered he was still in want of quiet . [We]2767-we laid [her]2789-her head for [the nearest port in [Spanish America]59-spanish america]2790-the nearest port in spanish america , for [we]2767-we could not risk the voyage [home]659-home without fresh hands ; and as it was , what with baffling winds and a couple of fresh gales , [we]2767-we were all worn out before [we]2767-we reached [it]2792-it . It was just at sundown when [we]2767-we cast anchor in [a most beautiful land - locked gulf]2793-a most beautiful land - locked gulf , and were immediately surrounded by shore boats full of [Negroes]2794-negroes and [Mexican Indians]2795-mexican indians and [half - bloods selling fruits and vegetables and offering to dive for bits of money]2796-half - bloods selling fruits and vegetables and offering to dive for bits of money . The sight of so many good - humoured faces especially [the blacks]2797-the blacks , the taste of the tropical fruits , and above all the lights that began to shine in [the town]2798-the town made a most charming contrast to [our]2767-we dark and bloody sojourn on [the island]187-the island ; and [the doctor]289-the doctor and [the squire]661-the squire , taking [me]0-i along with [them]2802-them , went [ashore]1411-ashore to pass the early part of the night . Here [they]2802-them met [the captain of [an English man - of - war]2805-an english man - of - war]2804-the captain of an english man - of - war , fell in talk with [him]2804-the captain of an english man - of - war , went on board [[his]2804-the captain of an english man - of - war ship]2806-his ship , and , in short , had so agreeable a time that day was breaking when [we]2767-we came alongside [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola . [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn was on [deck]3158-deck alone , and as soon as [we]2767-we came on board [he]103-ben gunn began , with wonderful contortions , to make [us]2767-we a confession . [Silver]101-silver was gone . [The maroon]2666-the maroon had connived at [his]2666-the maroon escape in [a shore boat]2809-a shore boat some hours ago , and [he]2666-the maroon now assured [us]2767-we [he]2666-the maroon had only done so to preserve [our]2767-we lives , which would certainly have been forfeit if " [that man with the one leg]4075-that man with the one leg had stayed aboard . "[2666-the maroon] But this was not all . [The sea - cook]732-the sea - cook had not gone empty - handed . [He]732-the sea - cook had cut through a bulkhead unobserved and had removed one of the sacks of coin , worth perhaps three or four hundred guineas , to help [him]732-the sea - cook on [his]732-the sea - cook further wanderings . [I]0-i think [we]2767-we were all pleased to be so cheaply quit of [him]732-the sea - cook . Well , to make a long story short , [we]2767-we got a few hands on board , made a good cruise [home]659-home , and [the HISPANIOLA]16-the hispaniola reached [Bristol]12-bristol just as [Mr. Blandly]94-blandly was beginning to think of fitting out [[her]16-the hispaniola consort]1309-her consort . [Five men only of those who had sailed]2813-five men only of those who had sailed returned with [her]16-the hispaniola . " Drink and [the devil]3258-the devil had done for the rest , "[2813-five men only of those who had sailed] with a vengeance , although , to be sure , [we]2767-we were not quite in so bad a case as [that other ship [they]2813-five men only of those who had sailed sang about]2814-that other ship they sang about : With [one man of [[her]16-the hispaniola crew]3690-her crew alive , What put to sea with seventy - five]2815-one man of her crew alive , what put to sea with seventy - five . [All of [us]2767-we]1986-all of us had an ample share of the treasure and used it wisely or foolishly , according to [our]2767-we natures . [Captain Smollett]108-captain smollett is now retired from [the sea]250-the sea . [Gray]133-gray not only saved [his]133-gray money , but being suddenly smit with the desire to rise , also studied [his]133-gray profession , and [he]133-gray is now [mate]2839-mate and [part owner of [a fine full - rigged ship]2821-a fine full - rigged ship]2820-part owner of a fine full - rigged ship , married besides , and [the father of a family]2822-the father of a family . As for [Ben Gunn]103-ben gunn , [he]103-ben gunn got a thousand pounds , which [he]103-ben gunn spent or lost in three weeks , or to be more exact , in nineteen days , for [he]103-ben gunn was back begging on the twentieth . Then [he]103-ben gunn was given [a lodge to keep]2823-a lodge to keep , exactly as [he]103-ben gunn had feared upon [the island]187-the island ; and [he]103-ben gunn still lives , a great favourite , though something of a butt , with [the country boys]2825-the country boys , and [a notable singer in [church]2371-church on Sundays and [saints]2828-saints ' days]2826-a notable singer in church on sundays and saints ' days . [Of Silver]101-silver [we]2829-we have heard no more . [That formidable seafaring man with one leg]2830-that formidable seafaring man with one leg has at last gone clean out of [my]0-i life ; but [I]0-i dare say [he]2830-that formidable seafaring man with one leg met [[his]2830-that formidable seafaring man with one leg old Negress]2831-his old negress , and perhaps still lives in comfort with [her]2831-his old negress and [Captain Flint]74-flint . It is to be hoped so , [I]0-i suppose , for [his]2830-that formidable seafaring man with one leg chances of comfort in [another world]3725-another world are very small . The bar silver and the arms still lie , for all that [I]0-i know , where [Flint]74-flint buried them ; and certainly they shall lie there for [me]0-i . [Oxen]2833-oxen and wain - ropes would not bring [me]0-i back again to [that accursed island]2834-that accursed island ; and the worst dreams that ever [I]0-i have are when [I]0-i hear the surf booming about [its]2834-that accursed island coasts or start upright in bed with the sharp voice of [Captain Flint]74-flint still ringing in [my]0-i ears : " Pieces of eight ! Pieces of eight ! "[74-flint]
